feature_model.name: Drupal
feature_model.feature_tree: r: DRUPAL (DRUPAL) :o BLOG (BLOG) :o FORUM (FORUM) :o BOOK (BOOK) :o AGGREGATOR (AGGREGATOR) :o LIST (LIST) :o NUMBER (NUMBER) :o OPTIONS (OPTIONS) :o FIELD_UI (FIELD_UI) :o IMAGE (IMAGE) :o FILE (FILE) :o TESTING (TESTING) :o CTOOLS (CTOOLS) :o CTOOLS_ACCESS_RULESET (CTOOLS_ACCESS_RULESET) :o VIEWS_CONTENT (VIEWS_CONTENT) :o CTOOLS_CUSTOM_CONTENT (CTOOLS_CUSTOM_CONTENT) :o VIEWS (VIEWS) :o VIEWS_UI (VIEWS_UI) :o TAXONOMY (TAXONOMY) :o COMMENT (COMMENT) :o BLOCK (BLOCK)
feature_model.constraints: CTC-1: ~FORUM or TAXONOMY CTC-2: ~FORUM or OPTIONS CTC-3: ~FORUM or COMMENT CTC-4: ~LIST or OPTIONS CTC-5: ~IMAGE or FILE CTC-6: ~VIEWS_CONTENT or VIEWS CTC-7: ~VIEWS or CTOOLS CTC-8: ~VIEWS_UI or CTOOLS CTC-9: ~TAXONOMY or OPTIONS
